channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fusion Grill 233 Waterloo Road, 25th January
item.description:
Daily overflowing bins. Rubbish strewn across pavement and on to the road. Again this morning and every day recently. This is a continuing issue and the Fusion Grill needs to resolve this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waterloo Road, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Big hole in the pavement (broken telecoms cover), 24th January
item.description:
There’s a large hole in a telecoms cover in the pavement which is dangerous for elderly people as their foot will easily fall down the gap without being obviously visible to everyone. It is just past denesmead (and on this same side of the road).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 100, Herne Hill, Dulwich Village, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of graffiti on walls at Peckham bus station area, 24th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hanover Park, Peckham, Greater London
